# DrawIt â€“ RoughJS-Based React Drawing Application

DrawIt is a modern and fast canvas drawing application built with React.
It includes advanced features such as keyboard shortcuts, text tools, project save/load, and customizable drawing styles.

---

## ğŸš€ Features

## Drawing Tools

* **Pencil (P)** â€“ Simple and fast freehand drawing
* **Rectangle (R)** â€“ Hand-drawn style rectangles using RoughJS
* **Arrow (A)** â€“ Arrow tool with auto-generated arrowhead
* **Text (T)** â€“ Add text with live cursor editing
* **Selection (V)** â€“ Move and manipulate elements
* **Eraser (E)** â€“ Delete selected elements

---

## Visual Features

* Color selection
* Adjustable stroke width
* Text size customization
* RoughJS â€œroughâ€ hand-drawn style rendering

---

## Save & Load

* **Save project (.drawit)**
* **Load project**
* **Export as PNG / JPEG**

## âŒ¨ï¸ Keyboard Shortcuts

| Shortcut               | Action          |
| ---------------------- | --------------- |
| **P**                  | Pencil          |
| **R**                  | Rectangle       |
| **A**                  | Arrow           |
| **T**                  | Text            |
| **V**                  | Selection       |
| **E**                  | Eraser          |
| **Ctrl + Z**           | Undo            |
| **Delete / Backspace** | Delete selected |
| **Ctrl + S**           | Export menu     |
| **?**                  | Shortcut help   |
